@pnkfelix By "Backtrace for issue-868.rs" do you mean for issue-9047.rs?
I had the same three failures on Linux.
@lkuper by the way, I think the workaround in #9129 is probably applicable to all three of these cases (all of which are uses of `break 'label` or `loop 'label`, I believe.
Can reproduce on OS X too, against 150b4ff. ([gist](https://gist.github.com/lkuper/6558800))
